name: SpherizeMode

properties.description: Distorts the image as if it is wrapped around a sphere.
properties.name: NORMAL

properties.description: Distorts the image as if it is wrapped around a horizontal cylinder.
properties.name: HORIZONTAL

properties.description: Distorts the image as if it is wrapped around a vertical cylinder.
properties.name: VERTICAL

description: The curve (or stretch shape) to use for the distortion.
